sentences.zh: 太史公曰：五帝、三代之記，尚矣。

translations.text: The Grand Historian says: The records of the Five Emperors and Three Ages are already ancient.

sentences.zh: 自殷以前諸侯不可得而譜，周以來乃頗可著。

translations.text: From Yin and before, the feudal lords cannot be charted, from Zhou and later they can somewhat be recorded.

sentences.zh: 孔子因史文次春秋，紀元年，正時日月，蓋其詳哉。

translations.text: Confucius followed the historical documents to arrange the Spring and Autumn Annals, recording the first year, correcting the times days and months, how detailed it is.

sentences.zh: 至於序尚書則略，無年月；

translations.text: As for arranging the Book of Documents, it is brief, without years and months;
Somewhat there are some, yet many are missing, cannot be recorded.
Therefore when in doubt then transmit the doubt, how cautious he was.

The Grand Historian says: The records of the Five Emperors and Three Ages are already ancient. From Yin and before, the feudal lords cannot be charted, from Zhou and later they can somewhat be recorded. Confucius followed the historical documents to arrange the Spring and Autumn Annals, recording the first year, correcting the times days and months, how detailed it is. As for arranging the Book of Documents, it is brief, without years and months; Somewhat there are some, yet many are missing, cannot be recorded. Therefore when in doubt then transmit the doubt, how cautious he was.

sentences.zh: 余讀諜記，黃帝以來皆有年數。

translations.text: I read the secret records, from the Yellow Emperor all have year counts.

sentences.zh: 稽其歷譜諜終始五德之傳，古文咸不同，乖異。

translations.text: Examining their calendars and genealogical records, the transmission of the Five Virtues from beginning to end, ancient texts all differ, contradictory.

sentences.zh: 夫子之弗論次其年月，豈虛哉！

translations.text: The Master's not arranging their years and months, how could it be empty!

sentences.zh: 於是以五帝系諜、尚書集世紀黃帝以來訖共和為世表。

translations.text: Therefore I used the Five Emperors genealogical records, the Book of Documents collected chronology from the Yellow Emperor until the Gonghe as the world table.

I read the secret records, from the Yellow Emperor all have year counts. Examining their calendars and genealogical records, the transmission of the Five Virtues from beginning to end, ancient texts all differ, contradictory. The Master's not arranging their years and months, how could it be empty! Therefore I used the Five Emperors genealogical records, the Book of Documents collected chronology from the Yellow Emperor until the Gonghe as the world table.

sentences.zh: 張夫子問褚先生曰：「詩言契、后稷皆無父而生。

translations.text: Zhang Fuzi asked Master Chu saying: 'The Poetry says Jie and Hou Ji were both born without fathers.

sentences.zh: 今案諸傳記咸言有父，父皆黃帝子也，得無與詩謬秋？」

translations.text: Now examining the various transmissions and records all say they had fathers, fathers all Yellow Emperor's sons, could it not contradict the Poetry?'

Zhang Fuzi asked Master Chu saying: 'The Poetry says Jie and Hou Ji were both born without fathers. Now examining the various transmissions and records all say they had fathers, fathers all Yellow Emperor's sons, could it not contradict the Poetry?'
Master Chu said: 'Not so.

sentences.zh: 詩言契生於卵，后稷人跡者，欲見其有天命精誠之意耳。

translations.text: The Poetry speaking of Jie born from an egg, Hou Ji human footprints, wished to show they had heavenly mandate and sincere intent.

sentences.zh: 鬼神不能自成，須人而生，柰何無父而生乎！

translations.text: Ghosts and spirits cannot complete themselves, must rely on people to be born, how could they be born without fathers!

sentences.zh: 一言有父，一言無父，信以傳信，疑以傳疑，故兩言之。

translations.text: One saying has father, one saying no father, believe with transmit believe, doubt with transmit doubt, therefore speak of both.

sentences.zh: 堯知契、稷皆賢人，天之所生，故封之契七十里，後十餘世至湯，王天下。

translations.text: Yao knew Jie, Ji were all worthy people, heaven's born, therefore enfeoffed Jie seventy li, after ten more generations to Tang, ruled the world.

sentences.zh: 堯知后稷子孫之後王也，故益封之百里，其後世且千歲，至文王而有天下。

translations.text: Yao knew Hou Ji's descendants would later rule, therefore increased enfeoffment to one hundred li, his descendants moreover thousand years, to Wen Wang then had the world.

sentences.zh: 詩傳曰：『湯之先為契，無父而生。

translations.text: Poetry transmission says: 'Tang's ancestor was Jie, born without father.

sentences.zh: 契母與姊妹浴於玄丘水，有燕銜卵墮之，契母得，故含之，誤吞之，即生契。

translations.text: Jie's mother with sisters bathing at Xuan Qiu water, there was a swallow holding an egg fell it, Jie's mother got it, therefore held it, mistakenly swallowed it, then gave birth to Jie.

sentences.zh: 契生而賢，堯立為司徒，姓之曰子氏。

translations.text: Jie born and worthy, Yao established as Minister of Instruction, surnamed Zi clan.
Zi means increase;
increase, benefit great.

sentences.zh: 詩人美而頌之曰「殷社芒芒，天命玄鳥，降而生商」。

translations.text: Poets praised and sang of it saying 'Yin altar vast vast, heavenly mandate dark bird, descended and gave birth to Shang'.
Shang means solid, Yin is the title.

sentences.zh: 文王之先為后稷，后稷亦無父而生。

translations.text: Wen Wang's ancestor was Hou Ji, Hou Ji also born without father.

sentences.zh: 后稷母為姜嫄，出見大人蹟而履踐之，知於身，則生后稷。

translations.text: Hou Ji's mother Jiang Yuan, went out saw giant footprint and stepped on it, knew in body, then gave birth to Hou Ji.

sentences.zh: 姜嫄以為無父，賤而棄之道中，牛羊避不踐也。

translations.text: Jiang Yuan considered no father, lowly and abandoned in road middle, oxen sheep avoided not stepped on.
Embraced in mountain, mountain nourished it.

sentences.zh: 又捐之大澤，鳥覆席食之。

translations.text: Again abandoned in great marsh, birds covered sheltered fed it.

sentences.zh: 姜嫄怪之，於是知其天子，乃取長之。

translations.text: Jiang Yuan wondered at it, then knew it was Son of Heaven, then took and raised it.

sentences.zh: 堯知其賢才，立以為大農，姓之曰姬氏。

translations.text: Yao knew his worthy talent, established as Grand Farmer, surnamed Ji clan.
Ji means root.

sentences.zh: 詩人美而頌之曰「厥初生民」，深修益成，而道后稷之始也。』

translations.text: Poets praised and sang of it saying 'its beginning gave birth to people', deep cultivation increased success, and explained Hou Ji's beginning.'

sentences.zh: 孔子曰：『昔者堯命契為子氏，為有湯也。

translations.text: Confucius said: 'Formerly Yao commanded Jie as Zi clan, because there would be Tang.

sentences.zh: 命后稷為姬氏，為有文王也。

translations.text: Commanded Hou Ji as Ji clan, because there would be Wen Wang.
Great Wang commanded Ji Li, to illuminate heavenly auspicious signs.
Tai Bo's Wu, then gave birth to the source.'

sentences.zh: 天命難言，非聖人莫能見。

translations.text: Heavenly mandate hard to speak of, not sages cannot see.

sentences.zh: 舜、禹、契、后稷皆黃帝子孫也。

translations.text: Shun, Yu, Jie, Hou Ji all Yellow Emperor's descendants.

sentences.zh: 黃帝策天命而治天下，德澤深後世，故其子孫皆復立為天子，是天之報有德也。

translations.text: Yellow Emperor received heavenly mandate and governed the world, virtue favor deep in later generations, therefore his descendants all again established as Sons of Heaven, this is heaven's repayment for having virtue.

sentences.zh: 人不知，以為閒從布衣匹夫起耳。

translations.text: People do not know, consider it rising from common cloth common man.

sentences.zh: 夫布衣匹夫安能無故而起王天下乎？

translations.text: How can common cloth common man without cause rise to rule the world?
It is having heavenly mandate thus.'

Master Chu said: 'Not so. The Poetry speaking of Jie born from an egg, Hou Ji human footprints, wished to show they had heavenly mandate and sincere intent. Ghosts and spirits cannot complete themselves, must rely on people to be born, how could they be born without fathers! One saying has father, one saying no father, believe with transmit believe, doubt with transmit doubt, therefore speak of both. Yao knew Jie, Ji were all worthy people, heaven's born, therefore enfeoffed Jie seventy li, after ten more generations to Tang, ruled the world. Yao knew Hou Ji's descendants would later rule, therefore increased enfeoffment to one hundred li, his descendants moreover thousand years, to Wen Wang then had the world. Poetry transmission says: 'Tang's ancestor was Jie, born without father. Jie's mother with sisters bathing at Xuan Qiu water, there was a swallow holding an egg fell it, Jie's mother got it, therefore held it, mistakenly swallowed it, then gave birth to Jie. Jie born and worthy, Yao established as Minister of Instruction, surnamed Zi clan. Zi means increase; increase, benefit great. Poets praised and sang of it saying 'Yin altar vast vast, heavenly mandate dark bird, descended and gave birth to Shang'. Shang means solid, Yin is the title. Wen Wang's ancestor was Hou Ji, Hou Ji also born without father. Hou Ji's mother Jiang Yuan, went out saw giant footprint and stepped on it, knew in body, then gave birth to Hou Ji. Jiang Yuan considered no father, lowly and abandoned in road middle, oxen sheep avoided not stepped on. Embraced in mountain, mountain nourished it. Again abandoned in great marsh, birds covered sheltered fed it. Jiang Yuan wondered at it, then knew it was Son of Heaven, then took and raised it. Yao knew his worthy talent, established as Grand Farmer, surnamed Ji clan. Ji means root. Poets praised and sang of it saying 'its beginning gave birth to people', deep cultivation increased success, and explained Hou Ji's beginning.' Confucius said: 'Formerly Yao commanded Jie as Zi clan, because there would be Tang. Commanded Hou Ji as Ji clan, because there would be Wen Wang. Great Wang commanded Ji Li, to illuminate heavenly auspicious signs. Tai Bo's Wu, then gave birth to the source.' Heavenly mandate hard to speak of, not sages cannot see. Shun, Yu, Jie, Hou Ji all Yellow Emperor's descendants. Yellow Emperor received heavenly mandate and governed the world, virtue favor deep in later generations, therefore his descendants all again established as Sons of Heaven, this is heaven's repayment for having virtue. People do not know, consider it rising from common cloth common man. How can common cloth common man without cause rise to rule the world? It is having heavenly mandate thus.'

sentences.zh: 「黃帝後世何王天下之久遠邪？」

translations.text: 'Yellow Emperor's descendants why ruled the world so long?'
'Yellow Emperor's descendants why ruled the world so long?'

sentences.zh: 曰：「傳云天下之君王為萬夫之黔首請贖民之命者帝，有福萬世。

translations.text: Said: 'Transmission says the world's rulers who for the ten thousand people redeem the people's fate are called emperors, have blessing ten thousand generations.
Yellow Emperor is such.

sentences.zh: 五政明則修禮義，因天時舉兵征伐而利者王，有福千世。

translations.text: Five policies clear then cultivate rites righteousness, follow heavenly timing raise troops attack and benefit are called kings, have blessing thousand generations.

sentences.zh: 蜀王，黃帝後世也，至今在漢西南五千里，常來朝降，輸獻於漢，非以其先之有德，澤流後世邪？

translations.text: Shu Wang, Yellow Emperor's later generation, to now in Han southwest five thousand li, often come pay respects submit, transport tribute to Han, not because his ancestors had virtue, favor flowed to later generations?
Practicing morality how can be neglected!
Ruler kings raise and observe it.

sentences.zh: 漢大將軍霍子孟名光者，亦黃帝後世也。

translations.text: Han Great General Huo Zi Meng named Guang, also Yellow Emperor's later generation.

sentences.zh: 此可為博聞遠見者言，固難為淺聞者說也。

translations.text: This can be spoken to broad knowledge far sight people, certainly hard to explain to shallow knowledge people.
Why speak thus?
Ancient feudal lords used states as surnames.
Huo is state name.

sentences.zh: 武王封弟叔處於霍，後世晉獻公滅霍公，後世為庶民，往來居平陽。

translations.text: Wu Wang enfeoffed younger brother Shu Chu at Huo, later generation Jin Xian Gong extinguished Huo Gong, later generation became common people, came and went dwelt Pingyang.

sentences.zh: 平陽在河東，河東晉地，分為衛國。

translations.text: Pingyang in Hedong, Hedong Jin land, divided into Wei state.
With Poetry speaking, also can be Zhou generation.

sentences.zh: 周起后稷，后稷無父而生。

translations.text: Zhou arose from Hou Ji, Hou Ji born without father.

sentences.zh: 以三代世傳言之，后稷有父名高辛；

translations.text: With Three Ages world transmission speaking, Hou Ji had father named Gao Xin;
Gao Xin, Yellow Emperor's great-grandson.

sentences.zh: 黃帝終始傳曰：『漢興百有餘年，有人不短不長，出（自）［白］燕之鄉，持天下之政，時有嬰兒主，欲行車。』

translations.text: Yellow Emperor complete beginning transmission says: 'Han rise hundred more years, there is person not short not long, came from Bai Yan district, held the world's governance, time had infant ruler, wished to drive carriage.'

sentences.zh: 霍將軍者，本居平陽（自）［白］燕。

translations.text: Huo General originally dwelt Pingyang Bai Yan.

sentences.zh: 臣為郎時，與方士考功會旗亭下，為臣言。

translations.text: Minister as lang time, with fangshi examined merit met at banner pavilion below, spoke to minister.
How not magnificent!'
